title: The Business of Design...
content:
Dear Typophile moderators and members,

I went out on my own last year and am interested in how others are managing the business side of their businesses.

Is anyone else interested in this conversation and if so, is there room for this here or should I leave that to another website?

jd
author: Jennifer E. Dahl

comments.content:
\> <cite>I went out on my own last year</cite>

Hi Jenny, according to your profile you are an art director in NY. Isn't that a bit late in your last year before retirement to ask that question?

SCNR  
Andreas

Hey Andreas,  
Totally don't get the joke here.  
Sorry.  
jen
